CustomField.description: If this is checked, the "Validate_ClosedCaseDependencies" method in the NI_Case_TriggerHandler Apex Class will not run.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If this is checked, the "Validate_ClosedCaseDependencies" method in the NI_Case_TriggerHandler Apex Class will not run.
CustomField.label: Bypass Case Validate Support Close Case
